name: NO SIGN OF LIFE LD#39
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/no-sign-of-life

Ludum Dare 39 Submission (48-hour Compo)

Theme: Running out of power

Space, exploration, adventure, survival, mystery... ESCAPE before you run out of power!

Made in Gamemaker Studio

Controls

Move: WASD or Arrow keys

Interact: Space

Toggle map (once you have it): Tab
